welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Epe, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming blend of traditional and modern culture in our beautiful city. From historic architecture to delicious cuisine, Epe has something for everyone. We invite you to explore and enjoy our city to the fullest!"

restaurants.name: Meyer
restaurants.description: Meyer is a german restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Brot Und Butter
restaurants.description: Brot Und Butter is a bakery located in the city.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Gronau.

restaurants.name: China Restaurant Guangfeng
restaurants.description: China Restaurant Guangfeng is a asian restaurant located in Gronau.

restaurants.name: Café Extrablatt
restaurants.description: Café Extrablatt is a café located in Gronau.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twente Airport handles all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Twente Airport is responsible for handling all cargo flights and shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
